language.err1Alert: Could not upload language file, the file must be a tar archive.
language.err2Alert: Could not upload language file, the language file verification failed. Make sure you are uploading a language file compatible with this product and firmware version.

language.err4Alert: Removal of default language or builtin languages is not allowed.
language.err5Alert: This language file was developed for a different firmware version of the product. It is still usable, but some translation inconsistencies may occur.

language_selection1.skipRegTxt: Language can be selected later through Setup > Languages.
